mapper.insert: INSERT INTO productQna(qnaNum, productNum, questionIdx, secret, question, showQuestion, questionDate) VALUES(productQna_seq.NEXTVAL, #{productNum}, #{questionIdx}, #{secret}, #{question}, 1, SYSDATE)
INSERT INTO productQnaFile(fileNum, qnaNum, filename) VALUES(productQnaFile_seq.NEXTVAL, productQna_seq.CURRVAL, #{filename})
mapper.select: SELECT NVL(COUNT(*), 0) FROM productQna WHERE productNum = #{productNum} AND showQuestion = 1

SELECT q.qnaNum, q.questionIdx, m.userName, secret, question, answer, answerIdx, m2.userName answerName, q.productNum, filename, showQuestion, questionDate, answerDate FROM productQna q JOIN member1 m ON q.questionIdx = m.memberIdx LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT qnaNum, LISTAGG(filename, ',') WITHIN GROUP(ORDER BY fileNum) filename FROM productQnaFile GROUP BY qnaNum ) f ON q.qnaNum=f.qnaNum LEFT OUTER JOIN member1 m2 ON q.answerIdx = m2.memberIdx WHERE q.productNum=#{productNum} AND showQuestion = 1 ORDER BY q.qnaNum DESC OFFSET #{offset} ROWS FETCH FIRST #{size} ROWS ONLY

questionIdx = #{questionIdx}
